description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The OCC_SPAN_CD table holds the occurrence span codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: OCC_SPAN_CD
columns.description: This item holds the occurrence span codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: OCC_SPAN_FROM_DT
columns.description: This item holds the beginning of the date span corresponding to the occurrence span code.

columns.name: OCC_SPAN_TO_DT
columns.description: This item holds the end of the date span corresponding to the occurrence span code.
